name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Phantom Blood
description:
Do you like JoJo's Bizarre Adventure? Then this game is for you! Go through the first part of the series as Jonathan Joestar - the first JoJo, and go on a bizarre adventur to defeat your mortal enemy - Dio Brando. Meet friends and battle foes on your way to complete your quest!

I do not own any of the rights to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure or any of the used graphics and audio. This is a non-profitable fan game.

Write a comment if you find any bugs or something doesn't work!
